snippet: There are plenty of ways to sift the information you receive from friends on Facebook and Twitter, like cutting back on updates from some friends without those friends finding out.
abstract: Tool Kit column offers advice on how to regulate the often overwhelming flood of updates from social networking sites like Facebook and Twitter.
lead_paragraph: There are plenty of ways to sift the information you receive from friends on Facebook and Twitter, like cutting back on updates from some friends without those friends finding out.

headline.seo: Facebook and Twitter Needn’t Flood Your In-box
headline.main: Relief Valves for Flooded Social Networks
headline.print_headline: Relief Valves for Flooded Social Networks
